title: Between cultures
creator_credit: David Zweck, Daryl Wayland and Country Education Project
brief_description: Peter Couchman explores human relationships between cultures and the struggle to obtain cultural identity. The theme is gradually unfolded through interviews with Morag Loh, co-author of “The Immigrants” and discussion with people personally involved with the struggle between cultures.
